languages.text: "Какая деталь? Говори, ублюдок!" {n}Соломон повышает голос и делает шаг к Блефу, явно пытаясь отвлечь его внимание на себя. Замерев, Глейто безмолвно ожидает сигнала к нападению.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Да? И какая же?" {n}Соломон делает шаг к Блефу, отвлекая его внимание от Глейто.{/n}
traits.speaker: SolomorneCompanion

languages.text: "What detail? Talk, you bastard!" {n}Solomorne raises his voice and takes a step toward Bluff, clearly trying to draw his attention. Glaito freezes, silently awaiting the signal to attack.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Какая деталь? Говори, ублюдок!" {n}Соломон повышает голос и делает шаг к Блефу, явно пытаясь отвлечь его внимание на себя. Замерев, Глейто безмолвно ожидает сигнала к нападению.{/n}

"What detail? Talk, you bastard!" {n}Solomorne raises his voice and takes a step toward Bluff, clearly trying to draw his attention. Glaito freezes, silently awaiting the signal to attack.{/n}

languages.text: “什么细节？说清楚，你这个渣滓！”{n}索罗蒙提高了音量，朝闹闹走了一步。很显然，他打算吸引闹闹的注意力。格雷托一动不动，默默等待着进攻的信号。{/n}
languages.original_text: "What detail? Talk, you bastard!" {n}Solomorne raises his voice and takes a step toward Bluff, clearly trying to draw his attention. Glaito freezes, silently awaiting the signal to attack.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “什么细节？说清楚，你这个渣滓！”{n}索罗蒙提高了音量，朝闹闹走了一步。很显然，他打算吸引闹闹的注意力。格雷托一动不动，默默等待着进攻的信号。{/n}

languages.text: «¿Qué detalle? ¡Habla, malnacido!», {n}exclama Solomorne dando un paso al frente en un obvio intento de llamar la atención de Farol. Glaito, inmóvil, espera la señal para atacar.{/n}
languages.original_text: "What detail? Talk, you bastard!" {n}Solomorne raises his voice and takes a step toward Bluff, clearly trying to draw his attention. Glaito freezes, silently awaiting the signal to attack.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¿Qué detalle? ¡Habla, malnacido!», {n}exclama Solomorne dando un paso al frente en un obvio intento de llamar la atención de Farol. Glaito, inmóvil, espera la señal para atacar.{/n}

languages.text: "Ne ayrıntısı? Konuş köpek!" {n}Solomorne, sesini yükseltip Kurusıkı'ya doğru bir adım atıyor. Dikkatini çekmeye çalışıyor. Hareketsiz duran Glaito ise saldırı işaretini bekliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "What detail? Talk, you bastard!" {n}Solomorne raises his voice and takes a step toward Bluff, clearly trying to draw his attention. Glaito freezes, silently awaiting the signal to attack.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ne ayrıntısı? Konuş köpek!" {n}Solomorne, sesini yükseltip Kurusıkı'ya doğru bir adım atıyor. Dikkatini çekmeye çalışıyor. Hareketsiz duran Glaito ise saldırı işaretini bekliyor.{/n}

languages.text: 「細かいこととは何だ？話せ、馬鹿野郎！」{n}ソロモーンは声を荒げ、ブラフに一歩近づく。明らかに注意を彼自身に向けて、グライトに時間を稼がせようとしている。{/n}
languages.original_text: "What detail? Talk, you bastard!" {n}Solomorne raises his voice and takes a step toward Bluff, clearly trying to draw attention to himself and buy Glaito some time.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「細かいこととは何だ？話せ、馬鹿野郎！」{n}ソロモーンは声を荒げ、ブラフに一歩近づく。明らかに注意を彼自身に向けて、グライトに時間を稼がせようとしている。{/n}

languages.text: « Lequel ? Parlez, enflure ! » {n}s'écrie Solomorne en faisant un pas vers Bluff pour tenter d'attirer son attention. Glaito se fige, attendant en silence le signal de passer à l'attaque.{/n}
languages.original_text: "What detail? Talk, you bastard!" {n}Solomorne raises his voice and takes a step toward Bluff, clearly trying to draw his attention. Glaito freezes, silently awaiting the signal to attack.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Lequel ? Parlez, enflure ! » {n}s'écrie Solomorne en faisant un pas vers Bluff pour tenter d'attirer son attention. Glaito se fige, attendant en silence le signal de passer à l'attaque.{/n}

languages.text: "Welche Kleinigkeit? Redet, Bastard!" {n}Solomorne erhebt die Stimme und tritt einen Schritt auf Bluff zu, um seine Aufmerksamkeit zu erregen. Glaito verharrt lautlos und wartet auf das Signal zum Angriff.{/n}
languages.original_text: "What detail? Talk, you bastard!" {n}Solomorne raises his voice and takes a step toward Bluff, clearly trying to draw his attention. Glaito freezes, silently awaiting the signal to attack.{/n}
